name: AFGResourceExtractorHologram
comment: Hologram for buildings that can only be placed (snapped) on resource nodes.

methods.name: CheckResourcesAvailable
methods.comment: Helper to check if there's resources available for IsValidPlacement.

methods.name: CheckMinimumDepth
methods.comment: Check if this hologram meets minimum depth requirements.

properties.name: mAllowedResourceForms
properties.comment: What form can the overlapping resources be in.

properties.name: mOnlyAllowCertainResources
properties.comment: Only allow certain specified resources ( set on the buildable )

properties.name: mMustPlaceOnResourceDisqualifier
properties.comment: Class of disqualifier to display when not snapped to a resource ( copied from buildable )

properties.name: mAllowedResources
properties.comment: If this buildable only allows certain resources for placement, this is the list of those taken from the buildable

properties.name: mSnappedExtractableResource
properties.comment: The resource node we snapped to.

properties.name: mExtractorTypeName
properties.comment: name used to mathc types of extractros for compatiblility when upgrading

properties.name: mMinimumDepthForPlacement
properties.comment: Minimum depth for placement assigned from the Buildable

properties.name: mRequireResourceAtMinimumDepthChecks
properties.comment: Require collision with the resource class at all minimum depth points? Assigned from the buildable

properties.name: mDepthTraceOriginOffset
properties.comment: Origin Offset when performing minimum depth traces. Assigned from the buildable
